FuncDef: This command defines an explicit maximum frame-based bandwidth limit for the HSMDA scheduler policy scheduler. If amax-rateis defined that is smaller than the port rate, the port will be rate limited to the expressed megabits-per-second value. This command should be used with caution if the policy may be applied on ingress for an HSMDA as the total port ingress rate will be limited to the defined maximum rate.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an explicit maximum frame-based bandwidth limit for the HSMDA scheduler policy scheduler. Values-1 to 40000000 megabits per second, max.
Specifies the burst limit size. Values-1 to 327680.
Specifies to use the size in bytes.
Specifies to use the size in kilobytes.
